General.Name: Kapuas Prima Coal Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Kapuas Prima Coal Tbk  engages in mining and trading businesses in Indonesia. The company primarily mines for galena, zinc, lead, silver, and iron ores. Its mining concession area comprises 5,569 hectares. PT Kapuas Prima Coal Tbk was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Jakarta Utara, Indonesia.
General.Address: Ruko Elang Laut Boulevard, Jakarta Utara, Indonesia, 14460
